_header: O lady dear O condite clear
Subjects: hymns, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, hymns to
_description: James Ryman, a hymn to the Virgin Mary — three stanzas rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
O lady dere o Condite clearO well of vertue & of
                    grace…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Whenne he shall come & Iugement makeWith hym to blisse
                    that he vs take
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 250.
